mapper.select: select hp.* ,START_M,END_M,START_T,END_T, START_W,END_W,START_TH,END_TH,START_F,END_F, START_S,END_S,START_SU,END_SU, LUNCH_D,LUNCH_W,CLOSE_SU,CLOSE_HO from hp left outer join hp_time on hp.hp_code = hp_time.hp_code where hp_name like '%'||#{place_name}||'%' and hp_tel like '%'||#{phone}||'%'
